statements: SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, type, user_id FROM notifications WHERE type = 'alert';
SELECT message_id, type FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 5 AND is_read = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, type FROM notifications ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT id, message_id, type FROM notifications WHERE is_read = TRUE ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 1 AND is_read = FALSE;
SELECT id, type FROM notifications WHERE type = 'email' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT message_id, type, user_id FROM notifications WHERE id > 5 AND type LIKE '%notification%';
SELECT id, type FROM notifications WHERE is_read = TRUE AND user_id = 2 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE type IN ('email', 'notification') AND is_read = FALSE AND user_id = 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT alert_id, alert_type FROM alerts WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_text FROM messages WHERE user_id = 1 AND message_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM alerts WHERE user_id = 3 AND alert_type = 'urgent' ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE user_id = 2 AND message_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, message_text, message_timestamp FROM messages WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT alert_id, user_id, message_id, alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'urgent';
SELECT message_id, user_id, message_text, message_timestamp FROM messages WHERE user_id = 3 AND message_timestamp > NOW();
SELECT * FROM alerts JOIN messages ON alerts.message_id = messages.message_id WHERE alerts.user_id = 4 ORDER BY alerts.alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM message_alerts;
SELECT user_id, message_id, created_at FROM message_alerts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, user_id FROM friend_requests WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT description, update_type, created_at FROM updates ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM friend_requests WHERE receiver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM message_alerts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, created_at FROM message_alerts WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, message_id, created_at FROM message_alerts WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT description FROM updates WHERE update_type = 'new_message' AND user_id = 3;
SELECT id, status FROM friend_requests WHERE id BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT alert_id, timestamp FROM alerts WHERE friend_request_id = 5;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM friend_requests WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2;
SELECT friend_request_id, status FROM friend_requests WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT alert_id, message_id, timestamp FROM alerts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM updates JOIN alerts ON updates.user_id = alerts.message_id;
SELECT * FROM new_messages
SELECT message_content, sender_id, receiver_id FROM new_messages WHERE sender_id = 1
SELECT message_content, timestamp FROM new_messages WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, notification_type, is_read FROM notifications
SELECT message_content, sender_id, receiver_id FROM new_messages WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT notification_type, user_id FROM notifications WHERE is_read = FALSE ORDER BY notification_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT request_id, from_user_id, to_user_id, status, timestamp FROM friend_requests WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, email, join_date FROM users WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT update_content, user_id, timestamp FROM updates WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY update_id ASC LIMIT 5;
